name: Business Ethics_Feb.2023
description:
The Business Ethics Collection represents the skills necessary for professionals to anticipate, identify and handle ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that can arise in a business environment including making good ethical decisions and applying strategies to mitigate them. It covers a diverse range of market-demand skills, from applied ethics and communications to corporate social responsibility and strategic planning, 
This collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked in various business functions in an organization.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
author: Western Governors University
